title: Customized Project-Based Learning Design for Enhancing Private Education Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Environment supporting data analysis and collaboration via digital devices, featuring case studies reflecting professional practitioners' field experiences

learning_goals: Six determinants of private education satisfaction (instruction quality, teacher-student relationship, personalized services, facilities, cost, parental involvement) can be explained through project analysis
Customized learning design strategies can be applied to propose solutions for real-world educational challenges
Digital tools can be utilized to collect and analyze satisfaction survey data from private education institutions, enabling the development of improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
